resources.string:
The most desirable share accommodation in Australia. 

Discover your next shared accommodation with Otherhome. 

OTHERHOME! 

We have numerous experiences dealing with flatmates, and we are fully aware of your needs and rights. we give you exclusive "HOME AWAY HOME” experience during your stay. 

We aim to provide a service that will leave our tenant with the feeling of a comfortalble, warm, and welcomed stay in Australia. 

we may not be the best,we wish to provide a home-like experience and environment that will be just as comfortable as being at home. 

Now, we have expanded our business: 

Removalist 

Cleaning 

Property maintenance (all our team are licenced and qualified).


Copyright (c) 2022, otherhome.au All rights reserved.
